results.title: Black Lotus | Classic 20th Anniversary
results.description:
Details
Delivery will be completed in the shortest possible time from the moment of placing the order if there are no issues with the server's stability in the game. We will do it fast as possible, the average delivery time is 24 Hours. It can take up to 48 Hours (depending on Demand) or 7 DAYS if expansion is New.
We have a special Team only for the WOW Classic 20th Anniversary Items Section, with 10+ years of experience in this game, you are in the ideal place.
Boostroom customer support is available 24/7 during the entire year.

SPECIAL NOTE FOR BUYERS

All Items are Handmade and Legit, we are looking to provide the most quality and most reliable services. Any kind of Third-party system in our company is Forbidden.


REQUIREMENTS

Please be careful when you are procuring orders, make sure you are buying that on the correct realm, and please provide the correct character name.


ABOUT BOOSTROOM (OUR TEAM)

We are a well organized and highly professional boosting group of top skilled players.
Almost 10 years of experience in helping our buyers to achieve desired things in games.
Our goal is to provide and maintain top quality service and fair prices on the market.


DISCOUNTS

We value and respect every returning customer.
Therefore we often make a great discount to our loyal buyers.
Build relations and trust with BoostRoom for awesome deals and even better prices.
